</picture><div class="item__content"><div class="item__content-wrapper"><em class="item__category"></em><h3 class="item__heading">Brownfields Program Information</h3><div class="item__text"><p>The Brownfields Program has worked with developers to transform idle or abandoned properties into thriving businesses and residences. </p><a href="https://deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/waste-management/bf/background" class="button ghost inverted">Learn more</a></div><span class="item__count"><span class="item__count--current">1</span> of <span class="item__count--total">4</span></div></div></div></div><div class="item"><div class="item__wrapper"><picture  title="Rocky Mount Event Center: Brownfields&#039; 500th Agreement signed">
<!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/carousel___hero/public/IMG_6136_0.JPG?itok=ypG2iCMS&amp;timestamp=1562013396 1x" media="only screen and (min-width: 1280px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_desktop_1x/public/IMG_6136_0.JPG?itok=HFQEFYuJ&amp;timestamp=1562013396 1x" media="(min-width: 1024px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_tablet_1x/public/IMG_6136_0.JPG?itok=DQ7qN1BU&amp;timestamp=1562013396 1x" media="(min-width: 768px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_phablet_1x/public/IMG_6136_0.JPG?itok=fG9asdi_&amp;timestamp=1562013396 1x" media="(min-width: 480px)" />

</picture><div class="item__content"><div class="item__content-wrapper"><em class="item__category"></em><h3 class="item__heading">Brownfields Application Process</h3><div class="item__text"><p>Interested developers can follow the step-by-step instructions to apply for entry into the Brownfields Program.</p><a href="https://deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/waste-management/bf/apply" class="button ghost inverted">How to Apply</a></div><span class="item__count"><span class="item__count--current">2</span> of <span class="item__count--total">4</span></div></div></div></div><div class="item"><div class="item__wrapper"><picture  title="filler">

</picture><div class="item__content"><div class="item__content-wrapper"><em class="item__category"></em><h3 class="item__heading">Brownfield Sites in NC</h3><div class="item__text"><p>Find out where the more than 500 brownfields sites are across North Carolina!</p><a href="https://deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/waste-management/waste-management-rules-data/waste-management-gis-maps/brownfields-sites-and-boundaries" class="button ghost inverted">Check the Map!</a></div><span class="item__count"><span class="item__count--current">3</span> of <span class="item__count--total">4</span></div></div></div></div><div class="item"><div class="item__wrapper"><picture  title="Brownfields site">

<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/carousel___hero/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=hmeDAgvC&amp;timestamp=1562083364 1x" media="only screen and (min-width: 1280px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_desktop_1x/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=EXEeWgNs&amp;timestamp=1562083364 1x" media="(min-width: 1024px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_tablet_1x/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=NLsThiuU&amp;timestamp=1562083364 1x" media="(min-width: 768px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_phablet_1x/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=5ZfrxceI&amp;timestamp=1562083364 1x" media="(min-width: 480px)" />
<source srcset="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_phone_1x/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=ffJOPM73&amp;timestamp=1562083364 1x" media="(min-width: 0px)" />

<img  src="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/resp_hero-breakpoints_theme_nc_base_theme_phone_1x/public/20180119_144751.jpg?itok=ffJOPM73&amp;timestamp=1562083364" alt="Brownfields site" title="Brownfields site" />
</picture><div class="item__content"><div class="item__content-wrapper"><em class="item__category"></em><h3 class="item__heading">Property Management Unit</h3><div class="item__text"><p>The Property Management Unit works with brownfields property owners to maintain compliance per the Brownfields Agreement to protect human health and the environment. </p><a href="https://deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/waste-management/brownfields-program/brownfields-property-management-unit" class="button ghost inverted">Learn More</a></div><span class="item__count"><span class="item__count--current">4</span> of <span class="item__count--total">4</span></div></div></div></div></div>  </div>
</div>            </div>
              </div>
  </div>
  </section>

</section>
            </div>
                        <div class="field-item" >
              <section class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-full-width band theme-accent-light-blue pad-none no-gutter clearfix"
   about="" typeof="">

    <header class="band-header wrapper">
    <h2 class="section-title">Recycling with a Purpose</h2>
  </header>
  
  <section class="content band-content wrapper "
    >
        <div class="field field-name-field-full-width-markup field-type-text-long field-label-hidden " >
        <div class="field-items" >
                    <div class="field-item" >
              <p>A "brownfields site" is an abandoned, idled or underused property where the threat of environmental contamination has hindered its redevelopment. The Brownfields Program is the state's effort to break this barrier to the redevelopment of these sites. The<a href="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/Waste%20Management/DWM/BF/Website/PDFs/BPRA%20as%20ratified%20by%20NCGA%2020150930.pdf" target="_blank"> Brownfields Property Reuse Act of 1997</a> [NCGS 130A310.30 et seq.] sets forth DEQ's authority to work with prospective developers to put these brownfields sites back into reuse. </p>
            </div>
              </div>
  </div>
  </section>

</section>
            </div>
                        <div class="field-item" >
              <section class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-four-column band pad-top no-gutter clearfix"

              <section class="entity entity-paragraphs-item paragraphs-item-two-column band theme-accent-light-blue pad-small no-gutter clearfix"
   about="" typeof="">

  
  <section class="content band-content wrapper parts-span-two-third reverse"
    >
    <div class="group-left field-group-div">    <div class="field field-name-field-left-block field-type-blockreference field-label-hidden " >
        <div class="field-items" >
                    <div class="field-item" >
              <div id="block-bean-dwm-brownfields-spotlight" class="block block-bean">

    
  <div class="content">
    
<div>
  <div class="cards">
    <div class="card article framed" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
      <a href="https://deq.nc.gov/blogs?field_blog_category_tid=All&amp;field_blog_terms_tid=936" itemprop="url">
        <span itemprop="photo"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="https://files.nc.gov/ncdeq/styles/card_photo/public/Wegmans_0.jpg?itok=rlygUlBa" width="500" height="376" alt="Wegmans Raleigh - a brownfield site" title="Wegmans Raleigh - a brownfield site" /></span>
        <div class="meta">
          <h3 itemprop="name">Read the latest Brownfields Blog!</h3>
                      <time itemprop="datePublished" datetime="">Sep 26, 2019</time>
                                      </div>
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
  </div>
</div>            </div>
              </div>
  </div>
</div><div class="group-right field-group-div">    <div class="field field-name-field-right-markup field-type-text-long field-label-hidden " >
        <div class="field-items" >
                    <div class="field-item" >
              <p> </p>
<p>The North Carolina Brownfields Program has processed more than 500 Brownfield Agreements since the program began in 1997. Many are well-know while most are not. The Brownfields Spotlight will highlight a site that has an interesting background.</p>
<p>To learn more about where brownfields sites are in North Carolina, go to the <a href="https://deq.nc.gov/about/divisions/waste-management/waste-management-rules-data/waste-management-gis-maps/brownfields-sites-and-boundaries">Brownfields Project Map</a>. </p>
            </div>
              </div>
  </div>
</div>  </section>
